mapper.select: SELECT A.DEAL_NO AS DEAL_NO /* 딜번호 */ , A.DEAL_NM AS DEAL_NM /* 딜명 */ , NVL(A.PRDT_CD, '') AS PRDT_CD /* 상품코드 */ , T.EXC_SN AS EXC_SN /* 실행일련번호 */ , NVL(A.PRDT_NM, '') AS PRDT_NM /* 상품명 */ , NVL((SELECT MAX(B.ENTP_HNGL_NM) FROM IBIMS114B B WHERE B.BSNS_RGST_NO = A.TR_OTHR_DSCM_NO), '' ) AS ENTP_HNGL_NM /* 업체한글명 */ , A.PRDT_LCLS_CD /* 기업여신상품대분류코드 */ , NVL(s002b_1.CD_VL_NM , '') AS PRDT_LCLS_CD_NM /* 기업여신상품대분류코드명 */ , A.PRDT_MDCL_CD /* 기업여신상품중분류코드 */ , NVL(s002b_2.CD_VL_NM , '') AS PRDT_MDCL_CD_NM /* 기업여신상품중분류코드명 */ , A.PRDT_CLSF_CD /* 기업여신상품분류코드 */ , NVL(s002b_3.CD_VL_NM , '') AS PRDT_CLSF_CD_NM /* 기업여신상품분류코드명 */ , A.HOLD_PRPS_DCD AS HOLD_PRPS_DCD /* 보유목적구분코드 */ , A.IB_PRDT_CLSF_CD /* IB상품분류코드 */ , NVL(s002b_4.CD_VL_NM, '') AS IB_PRDT_CLSF_CD_NM /* IB상품분류코드명 */ , NVL(A.APVL_AMT , '') AS APVL_AMT /* 종목승인금액 */ , NVL(A.ACTS_CD , '') AS ACTS_CD /* 계정과목코드 */ , NVL(A.PRG_STTS_CD , '') AS PRG_STTS_CD /* 진행상태코드 */ , (SELECT MAX(EMP_NM) FROM IBIMS003B s003b WHERE EMPNO = A.CHRR_EMPNO) AS CHRR_EMPNM /* 담당자사원번호 */ , A.MNGM_BDCD /* 부서번호 */ , ( SELECT C.DPRT_NM FROM IBIMS003B C WHERE C.DPRT_CD = A.MNGM_BDCD AND ROWNUM = 1 ) AS DPRT_NM /* 부서명 */ , NVL(T.DEAL_EXC_AMT,0) AS DEAL_EXC_AMT /* 투자금액 */ , NVL(T.DEAL_EXC_BLCE,0) AS DEAL_EXC_BLCE /* 투자잔액 */ , NVL(T.ACBK_AMT,0) AS ACBK_AMT /* 장부금액 */ , NVL(T.EXC_DT,0) AS EXC_DT /* 기표일자 */ , NVL(T.EXP_DT,0) AS EXP_DT /* 만기일자 */ , T.NXT_PYM_DT AS NXT_PYM_DT /* 연체시작일자 */ FROM IBIMS201B A /* 딜승인기본 */ LEFT JOIN ( SELECT T2.PRDT_CD ,T2.EXC_SN /* 실행일련번호 */ ,T2.DEAL_EXC_AMT /* 투자금액 */ ,T2.DEAL_EXC_BLCE /* 투자잔액 */ ,T2.ACBK_AMT /* 장부금액 */ ,T2.EXC_DT /* 실행일자 */ ,T2.EXP_DT /* 만기일자 */ ,(CASE WHEN T2.NXT_RDMP_PRAR_DT < T2.NXT_INTR_PYM_DT THEN T2.NXT_RDMP_PRAR_DT ELSE T2.NXT_INTR_PYM_DT END) AS NXT_PYM_DT /* 연체시작일자 */ FROM IBIMS401B T1 /* 딜약정기본 */ ,IBIMS402B T2 /* 딜실행기본 */ WHERE T1.PRDT_CD = T2.PRDT_CD AND T1.EPRZ_CRDL_LDG_STTS_CD = '1' AND T2.LDG_STTS_CD = '1' ) T ON A.PRDT_CD = T.PRDT_CD LEFT JOIN IBIMS002B s002b_1 ON A.PRDT_LCLS_CD = s002b_1.CD_VL_ID AND s002b_1.CMNS_CD_GRP = 'E022' LEFT JOIN IBIMS002B s002b_2 ON A.PRDT_MDCL_CD = s002b_2.CD_VL_ID AND s002b_2.CMNS_CD_GRP = 'E023' LEFT JOIN IBIMS002B s002b_3 ON A.PRDT_CLSF_CD = s002b_3.CD_VL_ID AND s002b_3.CMNS_CD_GRP = 'E021' LEFT JOIN IBIMS002B s002b_4 ON A.IB_PRDT_CLSF_CD = s002b_4.CD_VL_ID AND s002b_4.CMNS_CD_GRP = 'I002' WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.LAST_YN = '1' AND A.PRDT_CD = T.PRDT_CD

SELECT B.DEAL_NO AS DEAL_NO /*딜번호*/ , B.DEAL_NM AS DEAL_NM /*딜명*/ , A.PRDT_CD AS PRDT_CD /*상품코드*/ , B.PRDT_NM AS PRDT_NM /*종목명*/ , A.EXC_SN AS EXC_SN /*실행일련번호*/ , A.EXC_DT AS EXC_DT /*실행일자*/ , A.EXP_DT AS EXP_DT /*만기일자*/ , A.KRW_TRSL_EXC_BLCE AS DEAL_EXC_BLCE /*원화환산실행잔액*/ , A.ACBK_AMT AS ACBK_AMT /*장부금액*/ , A.ASST_SNN_GRD_DCD AS ASTS_QTY_DVD_CD /*자산건전성등급구분코드*/ , A.SET_EVL_APRN_AMT /*집합평가충당금액*/ , A.INDV_EVL_APRN_AMT AS EVL_APRN_AMT /*개별평가충당금액*/ , A.RCVB_INTR_APRN_AMT /*미수이자충당금액*/ , ( SELECT C.DPRT_NM FROM IBIMS003B C WHERE C.DPRT_CD = B.MNGM_BDCD LIMIT 1 ) AS DPRT_NM /* 부서명 */ FROM IBIMS800B A JOIN IBIMS201B B ON B.PRDT_CD = A.PRDT_CD AND B.LAST_YN = '1' WHERE STDR_DT = #{stdrDt}

( #{item.stdrDt} /*기준일자*/ , #{item.prdtCd} /*상품코드*/ , #{item.excSn} /*실행일련번호*/ , #{item.excDt} /*실행일자*/ , #{item.expDt} /*만기일자*/ , #{item.krwTrslExcBlce} /*원화환산실행잔액*/ , #{item.acbkAmt} /*장부금액*/ , #{item.acbkAmt} /*평가금액*/ , 0 /*미수이자금액*/ , #{item.rmnExpYnum} /*잔여만기년수*/ , 0 /*부도율*/ , 0 /*부도손실율*/ , #{item.asstSnnGrdDcd} /*자산건전성등급구분코드*/ , #{item.indvEvlAprnAmt} /*집합평가충당금액*/ , #{item.indvEvlAprnAmt} /*개별평가충당금액*/ , 0 /*미수이자충당금액*/ , SYSDATE /*조작상세일시*/ , #{item.hndEmpNo} /*조작사원번호*/ , '' , '' , '' )
